p: Host specificity tests of S. lotanalis were carried out in glasshouses. These tests were conducted with the following Melastomataceae species: C. capitellata, C. hirta, M. mendoncaei, M. albicans, M. ibaguensis, L. lacunosa, O. confertiflora, Tibouchina granulosa (Desr.) Cogn., and T. moricandiana (DC.) Baill. The Hawaiian biotype of M. calvescens was also included in the tests.
